name: Inform user of attestation offer after QR code scan
scenarioId: android/A_combined_business_scenario_on_Travel_4/Travel-Issue_reservation_confirmation-issuer_initiated_remote-cross_device_68/issueReservationConfirmation:Inform user of attestation offer after QR code scan
methodName: Inform user of attestation offer after QR code scan

testSteps.description: Given the phone camera is opened
When the user scans the QR code
Then the EUDI Wallet informs the user that the Issuer offered to issue an attestation

userStory.storyName: Issuing reservation confirmation to EUDI Wallet
userStory.displayName: Issuing reservation confirmation to EUDI Wallet
userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want the booking service to issue a confirmation of my reservation and store it in my EUDI Wallet
  So that I can check-in easily to the hotel using my EUDI Wallet

title: Inform user of attestation offer after QR code scan
